channel.title: Dc when npc dies
channel.description:
Hey, ive got this weird problem. When i fight some npcs, during the fight or when it dies i dc and get an error.
[code]Now starting ******
Starting server on port: 43594 [Ge Prices loaded] [GrandExchange] - Loaded Offers [SERVER-PROTECT] Checking Host... [SERVER-PROTECT] Checking Pattern... Interface Id: 378 Button Id: 140. Interface Id: 548 Button Id: 38. Interface Id: 192 Button Id: 15. Interface Id: 750 Button Id: 1. Interface Id: 548 Button Id: 32. Interface Id: 548 Button Id: 35. Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.dropStuff(Player.java:3701) at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.process(Player.java:2317) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:258) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)[/code]
Sometimes i dc without getting this error.. What could be wrong? Does it have to do with the dropStuff method?
Thx.
Ps. Im using Drowning 508

item.title: Dc when npc dies
item.dc:creator: @Kecea Kecea
item.description:
@Kecea wrote:

at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.dropStuff(Player.java:3701)

There’s an array (probably containing possible drops, I guess) that’s too ‘‘full’’

Read full topic

item.title: Dc when npc dies
item.dc:creator: @bitty bitty
item.description:
@bitty wrote:

Hey, ive got this weird problem. When i fight some npcs, during the fight or when it dies i dc and get an error.

[code]Now starting ******

Starting server on port: 43594
[Ge Prices loaded]
[GrandExchange] - Loaded Offers
[SERVER-PROTECT] Checking Host…
[SERVER-PROTECT] Checking Pattern…
Interface Id: 378 Button Id: 140.
Interface Id: 548 Button Id: 38.
Interface Id: 192 Button Id: 15.
Interface Id: 750 Button Id: 1.
Interface Id: 548 Button Id: 32.
Interface Id: 548 Button Id: 35.
Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.NullPointerException
at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.dropStuff(Player.java:3701)
at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.process(Player.java:2317)
at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:258)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)[/code]

Sometimes i dc without getting this error…
What could be wrong? Does it have to do with the dropStuff method?

Thx.

Ps. Im using Drowning 508

Read full topic
